item.title: 华尔街监管机构将重新提出开放式基金 "摆动定价 "规则
item.description: 根据周一的一份监管议程，华尔街的最高监管机构不再希望推进关于所谓开放式基金流动性管理的 "摆动定价 "法规提案，而是在面临业界反对后选择发布一份新提案。【原文：Wall Street's top regulator no longer expects to move ahead with proposed "swing pricing" regulations on the management of liquidity at so-called open-end funds, choosing instead to issue a fresh proposal after facing industry opposition, according to a regulatory agenda on Monday.】

item.title: 美国联合航空公司航班起飞后失去方向盘
item.description: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）周一表示，该公司一架波音飞机在从洛杉矶起飞时，主起落架机轮丢失。【原文：A United Airlines jet lost a main landing gear wheel while taking off from Los Angeles, it said on Monday, months after a similar incident at the carrier involving a Boeing jet.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称贝恩资本接近达成收购 Envestnet 的交易
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周一表示，私募股权公司贝恩资本（Bain Capital）即将达成收购美国金融软件供应商 Envestnet 的交易，市值约为 35 亿美元。【原文：Private equity firm Bain Capital is nearing a deal to acquire Envestnet , a U.S. financial software vendor with a market value of about $3.5 billion, people familiar with the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 花旗银行将停止在海地的业务
item.description: 花旗集团周一表示，由于国际活动减少和海地机构客户需求下降，该公司将停止在海地的业务。【原文：Citigroup said on Monday it was ceasing its operations in Haiti due to diminished international activity and lower institutional client demand in the country.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司 11 个月来首次上调汽油价格
item.description: 巴西国营石油公司（Petrobras）周一表示，本周将在近一年来首次提高经销商的汽油价格，同时还将提高液化石油气（LPG）的价格。【原文：Brazilian state-run oil company Petrobras will raise gasoline prices for distributors for the first time in almost a year this week, it said on Monday, while also hiking liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) prices.】

item.title: 三藩市联储文件：美国 "盈亏平衡 "月度就业增长可能为 23 万
item.description: 据旧金山联邦储备银行周一发表的研究报告称，近年来美国劳动力的激增可能已将避免失业率上升所需的新增就业岗位数量推高至每月约23万个。【原文：A surge in the U.S. labor force in recent years may have driven up the number of new jobs needed to avoid a rise in the unemployment rate to around 230,000 a month, according to research published Monday by the San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank.】

item.title: 埃克森公司第二季度业绩低于市场共识，不包括收购先锋公司
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp）周一表示，整个行业炼油利润率的下降和天然气价格的下跌将减少第二季度的利润。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp on Monday signaled that lower refining margins across the industry and lower natural gas prices will reduce profits in the second quarter.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局因氧气面罩问题下令检查 2,600 架波音 737 飞机
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）周一表示，由于乘客氧气面罩在紧急情况下可能失灵，因此要求对 2600 架波音 737 飞机进行检查。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration said Monday it is requiring inspections of 2,600 Boeing 737 airplanes because passenger oxygen masks could fail during an emergency.】

item.title: 空中客车公司确认上半年交付 323 架飞机
item.description: 空中客车公司周一证实，今年上半年已交付 323 架飞机，比 2023 年同期的 316 架增长了 2%。【原文：Airbus confirmed on Monday it had delivered 323 airplanes in the first half of the year, up 2% from 316 in the same period of 2023.】

item.title: 麦德龙银行称正在就潜在抵押贷款组合出售事宜进行谈判
item.description: 英国贷款机构麦德龙银行周一表示，正在就可能处置价值数十亿英镑的住宅抵押贷款进行谈判。【原文：British lender Metro Bank said on Monday it was in talks about a potential disposal of residential mortgage loans worth billions of pounds.】

item.title: 波音公司正与美国国防部就认罪的影响进行谈判 - 消息人士
item.description: 一位知情人士透露，波音公司正在与美国国防部就该飞机制造商的认罪计划如何影响其大量政府合同进行谈判。【原文：Boeing is in talks with the U.S. Defense Department over how the planemaker's planned guilty plea could affect its extensive government contracts, a person briefed on the matter said.】

item.title: 商务部：中国在中欧电动汽车关税谈判中表现出 "最大诚意
item.description: 中国商务部周一表示，中方在欧盟电动汽车补贴调查磋商中表现出了 "最大诚意"，欧盟官员的评论 "与事实严重不符"。【原文：China has shown the "utmost sincerity" over consultations relating to a European Union investigation into electric vehicle subsidies, and a comment attributed to an EU official is "grossly inconsistent with the facts," the commerce ministry said on Monday.】

item.title: 纽约联储发现 6 月份近期通胀预期趋缓
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周一发布的一份报告称，由于对各种消费品和服务价格涨幅的预测有所回落，预计未来几年美国通胀的走势在6月份普遍趋软。【原文：The path U.S. inflation is expected to follow over coming years generally softened in June, amid retreating projections of price increases for a wide array of consumer goods and services, a Federal Reserve Bank of New York report released on Monday said.】

item.title: 法国左翼在大选中获胜令人震惊，但这对紧张的投资者来说并不是什么安慰
item.description: 法国左派联盟在大选中的获胜令人震惊，这让投资者更加警惕，因为他们已经做好了应对政治僵局和政策瘫痪风险的准备，但这不太可能改善法国岌岌可危的公共财政状况。【原文：A shock election win for France's leftist alliance has reinforced wariness among investors who had already braced for the risk of political deadlock and a policy paralysis that's unlikely to improve the country's creaking public finances.】

item.title: 因看好客户台积电，ASML 股价触及 1,000 欧元大关
item.description: 周一，ASML 的股价首次短暂突破 1,000 欧元（1,084.30 美元）大关，创下历史新高，因为在两家公司发布财报之前，ASML 的头号客户台积电获得了积极的研究报告。【原文：ASML shares briefly crossed the 1,000 euro ($1,084.30) mark for the first time on Monday, an all-time high, following positive research notes on top customer TSMC ahead of both companies' earnings.】

item.title: 加拿大西海岸港口罢工在董事会下令后得以避免
item.description: 加拿大劳资关系委员会在一份命令中称，加拿大西部港口的船舶和码头工头原计划于周一举行的罢工已被取消，因为该委员会发现工会的罢工通知违反了劳动法。【原文：A strike planned for Monday by ship and dock foremen at west Canadian ports has been called off after the country's industrial relations board found the union's strike notice was in violation of the labor code, the board said in an order.】

item.title: 工会称现代汽车与韩国工会达成临时工资协议
item.description: 一位工会官员说，现代汽车公司周一与其韩国工会达成了一项临时工资协议，可能避免在该汽车制造商最大的生产基地韩国发生罢工和生产损失。【原文：Hyundai Motor Co reached a tentative wage agreement with its South Korean labour union on Monday, a union official said, potentially avoiding a strike and production losses in South Korea, the carmaker's biggest manufacturing base.】

item.title: Vistra 和 Constellation Energy 因押注清洁能源需求而大涨，为人工智能技术提供动力
item.description: 核电公司星座能源（Constellation Energy）和威士达（Vistra）成为继超微（Super Micro）和英伟达（Nvidia）之后，S&P 500 指数中表现最好的公司，因为投资者将目光投向了半导体以外的领域，并押注于以任何形式迎合人工智能热潮的公司。【原文：Nuclear power companies Constellation Energy and Vistra have become the top S&P 500 performers after Super Micro and Nvidia, as investors look beyond semiconductors and bet on firms catering to an artificial intelligence boom in any capacity.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮推动康宁上调第二季度核心销售额预期
item.description: 康宁公司周一上调了第二季度核心销售额预期，原因是其用于生成式人工智能的新型光连接产品得到了广泛采用，这使得这家特种玻璃制造商的股价在盘前交易中上涨了 6% 以上。【原文：Corning raised its second-quarter core sales forecast on Monday, driven by robust adoption of its new optical connectivity products for generative AI, sending the specialty glass maker's shares up more than 6% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯-奔驰在斯图加特总部设立电池研究与生产中心
item.description: 本周一，梅赛德斯-奔驰在其德国总部为一个电池开发和生产中心举行了落成典礼，此举旨在进一步控制其电池的化学成分和工业生产。【原文：Mercedes-Benz inaugurated a development and production centre for battery cells on Monday at its headquarters in Germany, in a move to take greater control of the chemical composition and industrial manufacturing of its batteries.】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 Lucid 受惠于降价，季度交付量超预期
item.description: Lucid 集团周一公布的第二季度交付量高于分析师预期，原因是降价刺激了对其豪华电动轿车的需求。【原文：Lucid Group reported second-quarter deliveries above analysts' estimates on Monday, as price cuts bolstered demand for its luxury electric sedans.】

item.title: 在埃利奥特的压力下，西南航空将行业资深人士 Gangwal 加入董事会
item.description: 美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines）周一表示，该公司已任命航空业资深人士 Rakesh Gangwal 进入董事会，因为来自激进投资者 Elliott 的压力越来越大，促使这家美国廉价航空公司采取防御措施。【原文：Southwest Airlines has appointed aviation industry veteran Rakesh Gangwal to its board of directors, it said on Monday, as increasing pressure from activist investor Elliott pushes the U.S. budget carrier to take defensive measures.】

item.title: 欧盟对德国国家援助汉莎航空展开调查
item.description: 欧盟委员会周一表示，已开始调查德国在 2020 年 COVID-19 大流行期间给予汉莎航空公司的国家援助。【原文：The European Commission has opened an investigation into the state aid granted by Germany to airline Lufthansa during the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020, it said on Monday.】

item.title: 国营媒体称中国比亚迪计划投资 8.94 亿美元建设电动汽车零部件项目
item.description: 国资背景的《证券时报》周一称，中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪已签署协议，将建设一座新能源汽车核心零部件工厂，总投资额达 65 亿元人民币（8.942 亿美元）。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle manufacturer BYD has signed an agreement to build a factory for core parts of new energy vehicles with total investment of 6.5 billion yuan ($894.2 million), state-backed Securities Times said on Monday.】

item.title: 比特大陆任命新首席执行官，指导其完成战略审查
item.description: 比特币矿商比特大陆（Bitfarms）任命内部人士本-加农（Ben Gagnon）为新任首席执行官，负责监督战略审查，并处理与最大股东 Riot Platforms 的纠纷。【原文：Bitcoin miner Bitfarms , has appointed insider Ben Gagnon as its new chief executive officer to oversee a strategic review and navigate a dispute with its biggest shareholder, Riot Platforms .】

item.title: 工会称，如果激励措施不改变趋势，Stellantis 的意大利产量将急剧下降
item.description: FIM-CISL工会周一表示，如果政府最近推出的购买激励措施不能刺激需求，尤其是电动汽车的需求，汽车制造商Stellantis今年在意大利的产量可能会下降三分之一左右。【原文：Automaker Stellantis' output in Italy could drop by around a third this year if the government's recently introduced purchase incentives don't boost demand, especially for electric vehicles, the FIM-CISL union said on Monday.】

item.title: 德文能源公司将以 50 亿美元收购 PE 支持的格雷森米尔公司的威利斯顿资产
item.description: 德文能源公司（Devon Energy）周一表示，该公司已与私募股权公司 EnCap 达成协议，以现金加股票的方式收购其拥有的格雷森米尔能源公司（Grayson Mill Energy）的威利斯顿盆地业务，交易价值 50 亿美元，该公司的目标是利用高股票估值套现，以扩大种植面积。【原文：Devon Energy said on Monday it had entered into a deal to acquire private equity firm EnCap-owned Grayson Mill Energy's Williston basin business in a cash-and-stock deal worth $5 billion, as it aims to cash in on high stock valuations to grow acreage.】

item.title: 埃克森美孚预计第二季度石油盈利将增加
item.description: 埃克森美孚周一表示，与第一季度相比，油价的变化将使该石油巨头第二季度的上游收益增加 3 亿至 7 亿美元。【原文：Exxon Mobil said on Monday changes in oil prices would increase the oil major's second-quarter upstream earnings by $300 million to $700 million compared with the first quarter.】

item.title: 评级公司标普警告：法国悬浮议会使决策复杂化
item.description: 信用评级机构S&P Global周一表示，法国议会悬而未决很可能使该国的决策变得更加复杂，该机构同时警告说，经济增长持续疲软可能导致其评级再次被下调。【原文：France's hung parliament is likely to complicate policymaking in the country, credit rating agency S&P Global said on Monday, as it warned sustained weakness in economic growth could see its rating cut again.】

item.title: 礼来以 32 亿美元收购肠道疾病药物开发商 Morphic
item.description: 礼来公司和莫菲克控股公司周一表示，礼来将以 32 亿美元的价格收购莫菲克控股公司，从而使这家美国制药商获得一种治疗炎症性肠病的实验性药物。【原文：Eli Lilly will acquire Morphic Holding for $3.2 billion, the companies said on Monday, giving the U.S. drugmaker access to an experimental drug for inflammatory bowel disease.】
